note.p: Scottish-born cattle and sheep grazier in Australia. Elder brother of Peter Beveridge. Speared to death by Aboriginal people in an argument over stolen sheep.
Aust. dict. biog, s.v. Beveridge, Peter
Scotland old parish registers births, 10 March 1822, Dunfermline Associate (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 25 November 2020)
